flawed_nl_solution:
In the first round, Richard knocked down 70 + 15 = <<70+15=81>>81 pins.
In the second round, Patrick knocked down 81 x 2 = <<81*2=162>>162 pins.
In the second round, Richard knocked down 162 - 3 = <<162-3=159>>159 pins.
In total, Patrick knocked down 70 + 162 = <<70+162=232>>232 pins
In total, Richard knocked down 81 + 159 = <<81+159=240>>240 pins
Richard knocked down 240 - 232 = <<240-232=8>>8 pins more than Patrick.
